name: vincent-van-git
description: Use your Github commit history as a canvas!

scripts.predev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build src/ui/markup/index.pug --target electron -d app --public-url ./
scripts.dev: browser-sync start --server app --files app --no-open & parcel watch src/ui/markup/index.pug --target electron -d app --public-url ./ & cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ignore src/ui --ignore vincent-van-git.config.json --ignore app/ --exec "electron ."
scripts.preprod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/ui/markup/index.pug --target electron -d app --public-url ./
scripts.prepackage: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/ui/markup/index.pug --target electron -d app --public-url ./
